item.title: Report E-2025010134
item.description:
Report E-2025010134

Identified by scraper @ 2025-01-17T06:18:47+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-12-18
  • City: HOUSTON
  • State: TX
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS, LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: At 1225 ET, XPO notified ERTS of a cargo release of refused shipment at new terminal LHO. It was reported that residue from 250 lb Cat Battery released due to tipping over during transit. The release impacted trailer. ERTS reviewed the SDS with the caller and determined that terminal personnel are capable of cleaning the release with PPE available on site. The terminal used a 65-gallon poly drum for the waste.

item.title: Report E-2025010127
item.description:
Report E-2025010127

Identified by scraper @ 2025-01-17T06:18:47+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-12-13
  • City: DALLAS
  • State: TX
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS, LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: XPO with LDA called to report a hazardous cargo release. It was reported 1 gallon of UN 1133 "Elevate Ultraply Bonding adhesive" from 2-1-gallon pails due to fork blade puncture. ERTS reviewed the SDS, and the caller determined terminal personnel are capable of conducting cleanup. Waste was placed in 5-gallon metal drum for terminal personnel to manage.
